div.p:
Curia balliuorm burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo die mensis Januarij
anno quo Supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit to Duncan craik this day viij dais tile ansuer to the
borghe' fundin one him be Jonhne brabneir' for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of x s'
g' iiijor g'

The saide day Jonhne blak grauntit him to pay tile Androue litstar' s aucht pundis
and xvij Schillingis scottis money for Donalde Willman burges of elgin at the fest of
Witsonday next eftir follouing the date of this court or within viii dais thareftir at the far
rast but ony dilatour' excepcioun' or langir delay

The saide day mastir Jonhne merschele forspekar for Androw stratone Solempnitlie protestit that thar
suld' nay may witnes nor preuis be tane to depone in the actioun' debatable' betuix the
Relict of Androw steuinsone and the said' Androw anent the gudis of airschip et cetera clamit to pertene
tile vmquhile Androw steuart

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem tercio die mensis februarij
anno quo Supra

head.add: craftismen absent fra the procession' one candilmes day

div.p:
The said' day thomas meldrum William patonsone Androw lousone yongar Jok
allane and Richerd Wricht was Ilkan of thame in Amerciament of the court be thar
avne toung graunt becaus' thai passit nocht in the procession' of candilmes
day to detoir' the samyn et cetera and tile amend as law wile and forber in tym'
to Cum

The said' day it was Sufficientlie fundin that William Walcar' at the myln'
of Drum sal pay to Dauid andirsone xij s' and vj d' for x quartaris of clatht
within terme of law ande Williame Walcar his sone Come Souerte for the
pament of the samyn ande Androw fyf balye grauntit to releif the said'
Williame of the pament of the said' money within the said terme of law

The saide day the balyeis assignit friday that next Cumis to Duncan
Wandy alias andirsone tile ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be
Androw litstar for the wranguis withhaldin fra him of xxij s' g' wade
and ane Salt hide

head.add: thir personis chosin to pass euire Sonday and procure to Sanct' nicholes werk

div.p:
The said' day thir personis eftir writin was chosin and ordanit to pas' euire
Sonday ane of thame Circualie with Sanct nicholes bred' and procur'
tile his werk ande the sacristar sale warne euire settirday the
man that sale pas one the Sonday thareftir personalie and he that beis
warnit personalie and falyeis he being within the burghe without lauch
fule Impedment sale pay xl s' vnforgevin to Sanct nicholes werk
and gif the sacristar falyeis he sale pay be secludit fra his Office
Nomina In the first gilbert menyeis and prouost Johne leslie of Warderis ser Jonhne
ruthirfurde knicht Johne Cullan Androw Cullane Jonhne Colisone thomas
chamer Jonhne of mar' James Colisone Duncan Colisone thomas Waus
patry leslie Alexander gray Williame portar Dauid andirsone Johne andirsone
Androw fyf Williame Wormet alexander menyeis Dauid mar' george bisset
Jonhne blak patry chernside Williame murray patry Rede Williame
Rolland' Walter Cullan Duncan fyf Dauid fynne Mathou branche gavane murray
Androw lousone Jonhne of murray youngar Johne murray eldar Alexander
malisone

head.add: the toune and the mastir of the kirk werk

div.p:
The said day the prouest' balyeis Counsale and Communite present
for the tyme ordanit george bisset mastir of the kirk werk
caus' the plumbar to pas' and ende his werk and theik
the bodie of thar kirk with leide

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem septimo
die mensis februarij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said day Johnne of mar bailye commandit Wilyame scrimgeour
officiar to mak money of the pundis takin be him of Androw fif for
half ane vnicorne betuix this and this day viij dais and mak pament
tharof to the said Wilyeame

The said day henry Reid' grantit him to gif to Symone Ellone thre stane
of woll sa that the said Symone gef him ane discharg of al clames
that mycht cum one him anent the casting of his wol in tyme tocum
and' als' that he mycht be dischargit of the personis that followis him

The said day alexander gray askit at patry henry Reid ane barrell
of girsillis quhilk the said henry grantit him to ples' the said alexander
for the samyne

The said day Johnne mar bailye grant chargit henry Reid'
to comper one mononday that nixt cummys to ansuer to the borgh'
fundin / be thame one the said henry for the releving of / one him
be mathou branche and Johne craik for the releving of tham of vj
stane of woll at the handis of Symon' ellon'

The x day of the monetht of februar' the yer befor writin Duncan
craik oblist him be the faitht of his bodie to Refund' and pay to Johne
brabner xxxij s' vj within tuenty dais nixt hereftir for x s' g' and
x g' quhilk the said Johnne pait to copin nieman for the said'
Duncane for half ane barrell of saip And the said Johnne oblist
him be the faitht of his bodie to keip the said Duncan skatles and
fre of the said x s' g' and x g' at the handis of the said copin
nieman

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
decimo die mensis februarij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said day the bailyeis assignit friday that nixt cummys to Johnne
brabner to ansuer peremptourlie to the borgh' fundin one him be
be Wilyeame Watsone for the wrangis' withhalding fra him
of viij s' g' and vj g' flemys money eftir the tenour of the said'
borgh'

The said day the bailyeis assignit friday that nixt cummys to henry
reid to ansuer peremptourl Affirmative or negative to the borgh'
fundin one him be mathou branche and Johnne craik for the Releving
of thame of vj stanys of woll and ane half at the handis of
Symon elloun'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio xjo die mensis
februarij anno quo Supra

The saide day Dauid Was be his tounge graunt was in Amerciament of
the court for the denying to sele Collapis of mvtone to gentilmen
to thar and tile amend' as law wile et cetera

Curia Balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo
quarto die mensis februarij Anno quingentesimo decimo

The said day henry Reid' lauchfullie callit warnit and nocht comperit till
haue ansuerit to the borgh' fundin one him be mathou branche and Johnne craik
for the releving of thame of vj stanis of woll and ane half at the handis
of Symone Ellone tharfor the bailyeis chargit Wilyam scrimgeour officiar
to pas' and tak ane stres' of the said henry and lat it to borgh' agane gif
It be askit and warne him agane monunday to ansuer to the said borgh'
as secund' day of process'

The said day Comperit Richerd hennerson' litster befor the prouost and bailyeis
of the said burgh' sittand in Jugment within the tolbutht of the samyne and producit
this writ eftir folloving I richerd hennersone burges of Aberdene complenis to your
mastirschip apone a certane of personis and thir ar the Names Johnne of mar'
Johnne colisone Duncan Wandy and normond of lesly Androw naughtie Johnne I
cuk the quhilk I meyne to your mastirschip at Johnne of mar tuk me mastir
fully and put me in the corvy hoill and tuk foure elnys of blak and gef it to
Duncan Wandy for maill and I aw him nane' / and' caus hyme befor and se gif
I tuk ane hous' fra him the quhilk eftir my clayth was tane thai put me in
the tolbutht and causit me to tyne iij fattis of wad that cost me xij pund'
I complene mar' to your mastirship apone Normon of lesly at he come
and brak my dur and has restit all my gudes and I wait nocht quharfor
and' he has done me gret skatyh the quhilk I besek you of Remed And gif
ye will nocht I man sek quhar I may get Remed I complene apoun'
Johne colisonis wif at scho haldis fra me ij merkis for the lyttin of tua
stane of woll and cane nocht get pament Quhilk beand' red' herd'
sene and vnderstandin the said prouost and bailyeis gert call the said personys
befor thame And accusit the said Johnne of mar for the wranguis and mastir
full Inputting of the said Richerd in corbeis hoill and takin of foure
eln' o blak clatht fra him and giffin of It to Duncan for maill
The saidez' Jonne of mar Johne colisone Duncan Wandy ormond lesly
Androw naughtie and Johne cuk for the wranguis' causing of the
said Richerd' to tyne thre fattis of wad quhilk cost xij li Ande
the said ormond of lesly for the wranguis' brekin of the said Richerdis durris
and arresting of his gudis And the said Johnne colisone In the name of his
wif as he that comperit and ansuerit for hir for the wrnaguis' withalding fra
the said Richerd Duncan of tua markis for the litting of tua stanys of woll And
the said Duncan Wandy for the doing and foretefeing of all the said wrangis
Alsua thai accusit the said Ormond of lesly for the breking of the said Richerdis
durris now laitly of an land pertening to frer' Johnne Arnot minister of the
triniteis quhilkis wrangis actionis and tribulance the said personis opinlie
denyit referrand' thame till vnderlie the decisioun' of ane assis' of the best
and wortheast of the nychtbouris of the said burgh' to be chosin be the said richerd
and nain beand' except' and in continent thareftir the said actionis with the express'
consent and assent of baitht the said partiis was put to the decisioun' of thir
personis that is to say Dauid andersone Johnne Andersone patry reid'
Wilyeam rolland Wilyeame Wormet mathou branche patry chernsid' Dauid
fynne Androu meldrum alexander blynseill thomas Watsone Johnne craik
Alexander burnat cuthberd Johnnstoun' Androu brabnire Johnne of murray
and Wilyeame cheshame Quhilkis riplie auisit the Rightis ressonis allega
cionis witnes and preiffis of bath the said partiies herd sene considerit and vnder
standin fand and deliuerit all and In ane voce concordand' all the said personis
quyt and free of the said wrangis and actionis befor expremissit Reseruand'
to the said Richerd priuilege and fredome with his avin consent and assent and
desir' to preve befor thame within the tolbutht of the said burgh' this day
xv dais that the said Johnne of mar' and John' colisone' had skathtit him thre
fattis of wad quhilk cost xij li' Quhilk beand' prefit lauchfully
as efferis the said Johnne' of mar and Johnne colisoun' sall recompens to the
said Richerd' the said xij li' and gif he falyeis in his preif thai ar'
quyt of his chalang And atour thai fynd them said Johnn colisone In
the name of his wif awing to the said richerd vj s' viij d' for litting
of woll to be pait within terme of law

head.add: Inquisicio Katherine litster et margarete litster

div.p:
Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem curie quod Katherina litster
et margareta litster filie quondam Johannis litster burgensis dicti burgj
commorantis in le grene sunt legitimi et propinquiores heredes quondam dicti
patris de quadam le werkhous vocatus Jacente in eodem vico inter terram domini Willelmi
philpsone ex australi et communionem viam regiam ex boreali Et de quadam domo
Jacente inter terram alexandri roche versus oriens et terram quondam Johannis Durvard'
versus occidens

The said day gilbert Menyeis prouost requirit Androw mortymer coupar
Instantlie gif thar was ony personis withtin this burgh' duelland that had
offendit to him in word' or deid or had tribulit him his wif barnis or hous'
ony maner of wis' And gif thar was ony personis within the tolbutht for
the tym that he was planteous' on' Justice suld' be done to him And gif
thar was ony man' In the tovne that he was complanteous' on' siclik he
suld' caus thame be send' for and he suld' haue Justice of thame Quhilkis
Androw being of diuers' tymes requirit be the said prouost and balyeis ansuerit
and' said thar was na man' within this burgh' that he was planteous' one
except Robert chapman' his gud brodir

The said day James colisone bailye complenit to the prouost and bailyeis that is
was cumin to his knawleg that Androw mortymer had maid relacioun' and complenit
to the lordis that he suld' haue tribulit him and his barnis as he allegeit Requi
rand' the prouost and bailyeis to caus the said Androw comper befor thame to se gif
he had ony thing to say to the said James that he had offendit to him ony manere
of wis' he suld vnderlie the decisioun' and knawleg of ane assis' of
his nychtbouris quhilk Androw beand requirit be the prouost and bailyeis gif he was
complanteous' one the said James / ansuerit and said he was nocht planteous'
on' him in na thingis that he had offendit to him nor offendit neuire to him
in na tyme bigain

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
decimoseptimo die mensis februarij Anno et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said day Richerd' hennrersone litster grantit that he had ane
pece of clath contenyng sevin elne of Androw burnatis skynner quhilkis besouth'
the bailyeis to superced' him quhil settirday that nixt cummys to the hamcuming'
of his wif and he suld' deliuerit him

The said day Richerd' litster grantit that he had ane pece of claitht
pertening to Wilyeame malvin quhilk was lokit in ane almery
and his wif was fra hame and had the key of the said almery quharfor
he besoucht the bailyeis to superced' him quhil settirday to the hamcummin
of his wif and he sud' deliuer him the said' clath

The said day Wilyeame skynner followit Richerd' purrok as bund'
seruand' to him and protestit for his costis skathis and expens' that he sustenit
gif he be maid' his seruand

The said day Richerd litster graunt that he Ressauit vij elne of say
fra androw burnat be litit sad grene And the said androw
suld' gif him xxij d' for the elne litting walkit claitht

The said day Alexander slater grant that he was Souerte for mag slater
till alexander moir for xxtj s' and the day of the pament bigane at
mertymes quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay and or ger be pait within
terme of law

The said day Richerd hennerson' litster allegeit Wilyame still merchand'
man' had callit him fals And the said Wilyame denyit and said he
was the lelast mane that euire he delt witht

The said' day Robert murray one that ane part Ande Androw brabnir one that
vthir part chesit gilbert litstar alexander Roche Duncan andirsone and Johne
litstar yongar to pris' ane pece of grene clatht liand' in wed' to the
saide Androw of xvij s' be thar aithis and the said' Androw sale pay the
excrescens of the said' clath to the said Robert and bath the said partiis
was oblist be the fathis of thar bodiis to stand' at the deliuerance
of the said personis et cetera

The said day henry Red' lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht comperit till haue
ansuerit to the borgh' fudnin one him be mathow branche and Johne craik for the
Releving of thame of vj stanys of woll and ane half at the handis of Symon
Ellone' tharfor the bailyeis chargit gilbert prestoun' officiar' to pas and tak
ane' stres' of the said henry and lat it to borgh' agane gife It be askit and warne
him agane friday the xxj day of this Instant moneth' of februar to ansuer'
to the said borgh' as thrid day of proces'

head.foreign: quatuor littere regia producte per magistrum Alexandrum Setoun'

div.p:
James be the grace of god' king of Scottis To the Aldirman and bailyeis of our'
burgh' of Aberdene greting fforsamekle' as It is humlie menit and schawin be our
louitt clerk mastir Alexander Setoun' That quhar he has bocht ane
borrowland' and tenement liand' within our' said burgh' fra george tailyeour
and Marioun' Duncansone his' spous and has charter and possessioun' tharof eftir the
consuetude of our' burrowis Neuirtheles' certane evill disposit personis vexis
and trubullis him and his tenentis his possessioun' of his said land' and tenement
to his gret skaith and aganis Justice gif sa be Oure will Is herfor' and We
charge yow stratlie and commandis That ye in our name and autorite keip
and defend' the said' mastir Alexander in his possessioun' of the said' land' of
the said' land and tenement according to his Infeftment gevin to him thairupon'
ay and quhill he be lauchfullie callit and ordourlie put tharfray and this
ye do as ye will ansuer to wse vpone' the execucioun' of your office deli
uering thir' our' lettres be yow dewlie execut' and Indorsat agane to the berar'
gevin vnder out' signet At Edinburgh' the fift day of februar' And of our'
Regne the xxiij yeire
Ex deliberacione dominorum Consilij et cetera
